TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract SelectNamesDialog implements class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook._SelectNamesDialog

summary.span: 显示选择姓名对话框中选择一个或多个地址列表中的条目的用户和属性指定的集合对象中返回所选的条目。

span.span: Displays the Select Names dialog box for the user to select entries from one or more address lists, and returns the selected entries in the collection object specified by the property .

para.span: 这是.NET 接口派生的互操作性与相应的 COM 对象的托管代码需要 COM coclass。

span.span: This is a .NET interface derived from a COM coclass that is required by managed code for interoperability with the corresponding COM object.

para.span: 使用此派生的接口访问 COM 对象的所有方法、 属性和事件的成员。

span.span: Use this derived interface to access all method, property, and event members of the COM object.

para.span: 但是，如果方法或想要使用的事件共享相同的名称相同的 COM 对象下，强制转换为相应的主接口调用方法，并强制转换为最新的事件接口，连接到该事件。

span.span: However, if a method or event you want to use shares the same name under the same COM object, cast to the corresponding primary interface to call the method, and cast to the latest events interface to connect to the event.

para.span: 请参阅本主题的 COM 对象有关的信息。

span.span: Refer to this topic for information about the COM object.

para.span: 有关 COM 对象的方法和属性成员的信息，请参阅。

span.span: For information about the method and property members of the COM object, see .

para.span: 您可以通过调用实例化SelectNamesDialog对象的实例。

span.span: You can instantiate an instance of the SelectNamesDialog object by calling .

para.span: 显示对话框类似于 Outlook 用户界面中的选择姓名对话框。

span.span: The dialog box displayed by is similar to the Select Names dialog box in the Outlook user interface.

para.span: 它遵循内置 选择姓名对话框的大小和位置设置。

span.span: It observes the size and position settings of the built-in Select Names dialog box.

para.span: 但是，它的默认状态不显示 邮件收件人上方 到、 抄送，和 密件抄送编辑框。

span.span: However, its default state does not show Message Recipients above the To, Cc, and Bcc edit boxes.

para.span: 使用SelectNamesDialog对象来显示选择姓名对话框的详细信息，请参阅从通讯簿的显示名称

span.span: For more information on using the SelectNamesDialog object to display the Select Names dialog box, see Display Names from the Address Book
